problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in Rt△ABC, ∠ACB = N_0, CD ⊥ AB, and the perpendicular foot is D. If AC = N_1, BC = N_2, then sin∠ACD = ()
raw_answer:
解:在Rt△ABC中,∠ACB=90°,由勾股定理,得
AB=√{AC^{2}+BC^{2}}=√{2^{2}+1^{2}}=√{5},
由余角的性质,得∠ACD=∠B,
由正弦函数的定义,得
sin∠ACD=sin∠B=\frac{AC}{AB}=\frac{2}{√{5}}=\frac{2√{5}}{5},
故选:B．
raw_comment: 本题考查了锐角三角函数的定义,利用了勾股定理,余角的性质,正弦三角函数等对边比斜边．
